name: Qualms (DelishNachos)
description:
This is a very short RPG game based on old Gameboy games. It was made using the GBStudio development environment and was made in about a week. There may be many problems with the game as I have not had much time to bug test.

Controls:

Arrow Keys / WASD - move

Z  - Interact

Credits:

Cover Image - dream.ai
